TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Daniel_Ortega, title = Daniel_Ortega, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Ortega} }

S.FORM: I 1946 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 11 a romi'ad masofoc ci Daniel Ortega , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Nicaragua anini i ci Daniel Ortega, patirengan a romi'ad i 2007 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 10 a romi'ad.

I 1946 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 11 a romi'ad masofoc ci Daniel Ortega , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Nicaragoa anini i ci Daniel Ortega, patirengan a romi'ad i 2007 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 10 a romi'ad.
